image:image.image:caption: Regular movement is essential to boost blood circulation when standing for longer periods. Steppie&amp;reg; is the &amp;ldquo;best in class&amp;rdquo; wobble board designed by experts. Unlike other wobble boards, Steppie&amp;reg; encourages you to move with the correct pronation which avoids strains to the ankles, knees, hips and back. Steppie&amp;reg; is so comfortable you can stand for longer periods, which:Strengthens your backGives you more energyBurns more calories
image:image.image:title: Steppie

image:image.image:caption: Freedesk desk riser, is the simplest sit-stand desk ever created. It is very light (3kg) and child friendly. Freedesk is simple, portable, beautiful and affordable. With its unique Swedish design, Freedesk transforms any surface from being passive to being flexible and dynamic. Available in 6 unique colours and 2 sizes Shipping Fee UK/EU: &amp;pound;7.50 ex VAT
